description_en: Inplace subset to highly-variable genes if True otherwise merely indicate highly variable genes.
description_zh: 如果是True,则在高变异基因的位置上的子集,否则只表示高变异基因.

description_en: Number of highly-variable genes to keep. Mandatory if flavor='seurat_v3'.
description_zh: 保留高度可变基因的数量.如果flavor='seurat_v3',则必须输入.

description_en: If n_top_genes unequals None, this and all other cutoffs for the means and the normalized dispersions are ignored. Ignored if flavor='seurat_v3'.
description_zh: 如果n_top_gene 不为None,则忽略平均值和归一化离散度的这个指和所有其他截止值.忽略if flavor='seurat_v3'.

description_en: If n_top_genes unequals None, this and all other cutoffs for the means and the normalized dispersions are ignored. Ignored if flavor='seurat_v3'.
description_zh: 如果n_top_gene 不为None,则忽略平均值和归一化离散度的这个指和所有其他截止值.忽略if flavor='seurat_v3'

description_en: Number of memory running tasksnotice:1. The value range is 0.25-32 cores, in addition, 48 cores and 64 cores can be selected, and the CPU must be an integer multiple of 0.25 cores; 2. The memory value range is 1GB-512GB, and the memory must be an integer multiple of 1GB. 3. The CPU / memory ratio must be between 1:2 and 1:8
description_zh: 任务运行的内存数量,注意1.取值范围为0.25核-32核,另外还可选48核和64,CPU必须为0.25核的整数倍;2.内存取值范围>为1GB-512GB,且内存必须为1GB的整数倍3.CPU/内存配比值必须在1:2到1:8之间

description_en: Clip (truncate) to this value after scaling. If None, do not clip.
description_zh: 缩放后剪辑截断到此值.如果没有,不截断

description_en: If n_top_genes unequals None, this and all other cutoffs for the means and the normalized dispersions are ignored. Ignored if flavor='seurat_v3'.
description_zh: 如果n_top_gene 不为None,则忽略平均值和归一化离散度的这个指和所有其他截止值.忽略if flavor='seurat_v3'.

description_en: If n_top_genes unequals None, this and all other cutoffs for the means and the normalized dispersions are ignored. Ignored if flavor='seurat_v3'.
description_zh: 如果n_top_gene 不为None,则忽略平均值和归一化离散度的这个指和所有其他截止值.忽略if flavor='seurat_v3'.

description_en: ['seurat', 'cell_ranger', 'seurat_v3'],Choose the flavor for identifying highly variable genes. For the dispersion based methods in their default workflows, Seurat passes the cutoffs whereas Cell Ranger passes n_top_genes.
description_zh: ['seurat', 'cell_ranger', 'seurat_v3'];选择鉴别高度变异基因flavor.对于默认工作流程中基于离散度的方法,Seurat通过了截止点,而Cell Ranger传递的是n_top_基因.

description_en: Number of CPU running tasks.notice:1. The value range is 0.25-32 cores, in addition, 48 cores and 64 cores can be selected, and the CPU must be an integer multiple of 0.25 cores; 2. The memory value range is 1GB-512GB, and the memory must be an integer multiple of 1GB. 3. The CPU / memory ratio must be between 1:2 and 1:8
description_zh: 任务运行的CPU数量,注意1.取值范围为0.25核-32核,另外还可选48核和64,CPU必须为0.25核的整数倍;2.内存取值范围为1GB-512GB,且内存必须为1GB的整数倍3.CPU/内存配比值必须在1:2到1:8之间
